subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: When the results of Baseball’s Hall of Fame balloting are announced on Tuesday, Cal Ripken and Tony Gwynn will surely be smiling. But Mark McGwire is not likely to exhibit that same happy emotion.
snippet: When the results of Baseball’s Hall of Fame balloting are announced on Tuesday, Cal Ripken and Tony Gwynn will surely be smiling. But Mark McGwire is not likely to exhibit that same happy emotion.
